00092             function                pre_generation( $Options )
00093             {
00094                   try
00095                   {
00096                         $Path = _get_package_relative_path_ex( 'file_input' , '2.2.0' );
00097                         $this->PageComposer->add_javascript( '{http_host}/'.$Path.'/include/swfupload.js' );
00098                         $this->PageComposer->add_javascript( '{http_host}/'.$Path.'/include/plugins/swfupload.cookies.js' );
00099                         $this->PageComposer->add_javascript( '{http_host}/'.$Path.'/include/plugins/swfupload.queue.js' );
00100                         $this->PageComposer->add_javascript( '{http_host}/'.$Path.'/include/plugins/swfupload.speed.js' );
00101                         $this->PageComposer->add_javascript( '{http_host}/'.$Path.'/include/plugins/swfupload.swfobject.js' );
00102                         $this->PageComposer->add_javascript( '{http_host}/'.$Path.'/include/plugins/fileprogress.js' );

00131             function                controller( $Options )
00132             {
00133                   try
00134                   {
00135                         if( $Options->get_setting( 'upload_file' , false ) )
00136                         {
00137                               global      $extension_whitelist;
00138                               $extension_whitelist = explode( ',' , $Options->get_setting( 'extensions' , 'pdf,jpg,jpeg,gif,bmp,png,doc,docx,ppt,pptx,rtf,xls,xslx,tif,tiff,zip,7zp,gz,gz2' ) );
00139                               
00140                               global      $save_path;
00141                               $PackagePath = _get_package_relative_path_ex( 'file_input' , '2.2.0' );
00142                               $save_path = $PackagePath.'/data/';
00143                               
00144                               global      $file_name;
00145                               
00146                               define( 'NO_DIRECT_CALL' , 1 );
00147                               require_once( $PackagePath.'/include/php/upload.php' );
00148                               
00149                               $EventManager = get_package( 'event_manager' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00150                               $EventManager->trigger_event( 'on_load_file' , array( 'file_path' => $save_path.$file_name ) );
00151                               
00152                               //unlink( $save_path.$file_name );
00153                               
00154                               return;
00155                         }
00156                   }
00157                   catch( Exception $e )
00158                   {
00159                         $Args = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $Args , $e );
00160                   }

00223             function                process_string( $Options , $ProcessingString , &$Changed )
00224             {
00225                   try
00226                   {
00227                         $MacroParameters = '';
00228                         
00229                         $ProcessingString = str_replace( '{file_input}' , '{file_input:f=1}' , $ProcessingString );
00230                         
00231                         for( ; $MacroParameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $ProcessingString , 'file_input' ) ; )
00232                         {
00233                               $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $MacroParameters );
00234                               $Name = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'name' , 'file_input' );
00235                               $Type = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'file_types' , 'default' );
00236                               
00237                               if( $Type == 'default' )
00238                               {
00239                                     $FileExtensions = '*.pdf,*.jpg;*.jpeg;*.gif;*.bmp;*.png;*.doc;*.docx;*.ppt;*.pptx;*.rtf;*.xls;*.xslx;*.tif;*.tiff';
00240                                     $FileDescription = 'Supported types';
00241                               }
00242                               elseif( $Type == 'zip' )
00243                               {
00244                                     $FileExtensions = '*.zip;*.7zip;*.gz;*.gz2';
00245                                     $FileDescription = 'Zip archives';
00246                               }
00247                               elseif( $Type == 'all' )
00248                               {
00249                                     $FileExtensions = '*.*';
00250                                     $FileDescription = 'All files';
00251                               }
00252                               
00253                               if( $this->Security->get_gp( $Name , 'set' ) )
00254                               {
00255                                     $Code = $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/res/templates/file_field.tpl' );
00256                                     $Code = str_replace( '{name}' , $Name , $Code );
00257                                     $Code = str_replace( '{file_name}' , basename( $this->Security->get_gp( $Name , 'string' ) ) , $Code );
00258                                     $Code = str_replace( '{file_name}' , $this->Security->get_gp( $Name , 'string' ) , $Code );
00259                               }
00260                               else
00261                               {
00262                                     $Code = $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/res/templates/file_input.tpl' );
00263                                     
00264                                     $Code = str_replace( '{file_types}' , $FileExtensions , $Code );
00265                                     $Code = str_replace( '{file_types_description}' , $FileDescription , $Code );
00266                                     
00267                                     $Code = str_replace( '{file_size_limit}' , $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'file_size_limit' , '512 KB' ) , $Code );
00268                                     
00269                                     if( $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'single_input' , false ) == '1' )
00270                                     {
00271                                           $Code = str_replace( '{file_upload_limit}' , 1 , $Code );
00272                                           $Code = str_replace( '{file_queue_limit}' , 1 , $Code );
00273                                           $Path = _get_package_relative_path_ex( 'file_input' , '2.2.0' ).'/data';
00274                                           $Code = str_replace( '{upload_complete_processor}' , "function( Data ){jQuery( '#id_$Name' ).attr( 'style' , 'display: none;' );jQuery( '#id_$Name' ).after( '<span id=\'span_$Name\'>' + Data.name + '<input type=\'hidden\' name=\'$Name\' value=\'$Path/' + Data.name + '\'></span>' );}" , $Code );
00275                                     }
00276                                     else
00277                                     {
00278                                           $Code = str_replace( '{file_upload_limit}' , $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'file_upload_limit' , 0 ) , $Code );
00279                                           $Code = str_replace( '{file_queue_limit}' , $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'file_queue_limit' , 0 ) , $Code );
00280                                           $Code = str_replace( '{upload_complete_processor}' , 'uploadComplete' , $Code );
00281                                     }
00282                               }
00283                               
00284                               $Code = str_replace( '{name}' , $Name , $Code );
00285                               
00286                               $ProcessingString = str_replace( "{file_input:$MacroParameters}" , $Code , $ProcessingString );
00287                               $Changed = true;
00288                         }
00289                         
00290                         return( $ProcessingString );
00291                   }
00292                   catch( Exception $e )
00293                   {
00294                         $Args = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $Args , $e );
00295                   }
00296             }
00297       }
